title: Fly
abstract: 'Fly', directed by New Zealand choreographer/director Shona McCullough is a poignant story, told in dance/sign language, about a 15 year old boy who wants to escape and 54 year old man who must learn to let go.
description: Winner of the Digital Pictures Award for best short dance film/video was 'Fly' (2002) by New Zealand choreographer/director Shona McCullough. Shona's film, with performances from Richard Cesan and John Callan, is a poignant story, told in dance/sign language, about a 15 year old boy who wants to escape and 54 year old man who must learn to let go.
